On arrival, you will be met by one of friendly staff and volunteers who will guide you to the sign in sheet. Everyone is welcome to our space and can use it as frequently as they would like. , (We unfortunately do not have wheelchair access however. properties.description: 7 days a week. Midday - 10.00pm. Copr Bar is a licensed cafe serving hot food and drinks. It has sofas, ample seating and chairs, a piano and provides an independent and friendly welcome. SA1UTE military charity is also based at Copr and often hosts free coffee mornings - kept an eye out for on social media or inside the premises. SA1UTE/COPR also operate a Pay it Forward scheme where members of the public donate to the charity/business and they turn each Â£5 into a hot meal, treat, hot drink. This scheme is operating currently and is open to anyone in a vulnerable position. ; Free wifi; Free charging points for phones or other devices; Accessible entrance / venue; Toilets; Accessible toilets; Baby changing facilities; Children's play area; Games / board games; Outdoor space; Refreshments available; the premises offers a full menu of food and drinks to purchase; Copr operates a Pay it Forward scheme where people can approach the bar and ask if there are any funds in reserve to help people in a vulnerable position; ; Drinking water available; Book borrowing / book swap; Television; Advice, information and signposting; SA1UTE charity is based at Copr and has links with many other support groups in the community.; ;
